seg.quote: She was sitting with a cat upon her knee.
He lay down upon the grass.

sense.def:
Besedo
upon
uporabimo takrat, ko navedemo dogodek, ki je takoj sledil nekemu drugemu dogodku.

seg.quote: Upon entering the cabin, she sat down.

sense.def:
Izraz
upon
uporabimo med dvema navedbama istega samostalnika zapovrstjo, če hočemo povedati, da obstaja veliko število omenjenih stvari.

seg.quote: We drove through mile upon mile of brick villas.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki dogodek
upon someone
, se bo nekomu vsak trenutek zgodil.

seg.quote: Suddenly the concert was upon us with me totally unprepared.
